page.title: 12Recreation
page.content:
Four acres of well kept grass with a playing area, seats and Club house. Financially the Club is dependant upon members subscriptions,vice-president donations and bar profits. Matches are played from May until September sometimes three times a week.weather permitting. In July a floodlight match is played which is a great social event with barbeques and fun until midnight. Hungerford was the first place to stage this event.
The football club is approx. 4 acres with a playing pitch, a Club house, with two bars,stand to seat 75 people a covered standing area, floodlights. As facilities are good,often other clubs use the ground. There are five hundren non-playing members and a playing strength of 2O.
